name: Stack Platforms Crusher
description:
Crush all the stacks
Simple touch and hold game, just crush all the stacks

Stack Crush features:
✓ Level based Stack axes. Crush through levels
✓ There are various traps in the Stacks
✓ Control your ball, Crush down the stacks safely
✓ So, this is a Fast-paced, 3D crush game
✓ Suitable for players who like agile games
✓ Simple game, suitable for everyone
✓ Touch and hold to crush the stacks
✓ A game just takes a few minutes, you can play at any time
✓ Support both mobiles and tablets
